name: Administration Group
description: The Administration Group is designed to test the creation of immunization messages to support vaccine administrations, refusals, vaccination history and various observations related to the administration of COVID-19 vaccines. ACK messages are outside the scope of Test Cases and VIS is being replaced with Vaccine EUA Recipient-Caregiver Fact Sheets, which are specific for each COVID-19 vaccine.  Test Data are used to create immunization messages specific for the HL7 v2.5.1 Immunization Profile, which is based on the Immunization Standard Z22 Profile-VXU Message.
